nodes.text: The Adventurer 5 is the fifth issue of the LucasArts magazine The Adventurer. It featured a number of articles on Lucasfilm upcoming and released games, including one on Day of the Tentacle. The issue's credits listed "Keyan Farlander" as publisher.
The issue's cover shows the Day of the Tentacle characters in a parody of Tom Jung's poster for the first Star Wars film.
